thread.title: Sex scandal allegations: Iyabo Ojo opens up
thread.title_full: Sex scandal allegations: Iyabo Ojo opens up

author: Temiloluwa Temiloluwa
title: Sex scandal allegations: Iyabo Ojo opens up
text:
Tweet 
Nollywood actress, Iyabo Ojo has taken to the social media to show appreciation to God for seeing her through difficult moments. 
Even though the actress did not say particularly what the surmounted challenges were, she expressed belief that God will never allow things beyond her powers to overwhelm her. 
“I may fall a thousand times I tell you but I will always rise again greater than before, ” wrote the actress who kept mum throughout the period rumours were flying around about her alleged romance with men of God, Apostle Johnson Suleman and Pastor David Ibiyeomie. 
“I am never afraid to live because I know I will only live once! So I have chosen to be strong, I have chosen to be courageous, I have chosen to live happy,” she added. 
See the full post below. 
A post shared by Iyabo Ojo / Boss Lady (@iyaboojofespris) on Mar 21, 2017 at 6:02pm PDT
